page.title: 11CLUBS AND ACTIVITES
page.content: Hurstbourne Tarrant does not have a Village Hall, so the{Church Hall}the {British Legion Hall}and the{Methodist {Schoolroom}are used by various organisations. {Church Hall}:- Judo, Womens' Institute, Play Group, Bourne Valley Gardeners' Club, Parish Council, Whist Drive, Parochial Church Council, Church Hall Sub - Committee, Doctor's Surgery. {British Legion Hall}:- Football Club, Darts Teams, Pool Team, Over 60's Social Club, Computerised Games, Doctor's Surgery. {Methodist Schoolroom}:- Shell Club, Womens Fellowship, Wesley Guild. {Selected Houses}(by courtesy of their owners) :- Hurstbourne Tarrant and District Horticultural Society {Vicarage} Mother's Union
